net.datenwerke.rs.core.service.mail

Class MailModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractModule
      • net.datenwerke.rs.core.service.guice.AbstractReportServerModule
        • net.datenwerke.rs.core.service.mail.MailModule

  • public class MailModule
extends AbstractReportServerModule
    The mail module provides the ability to send EMails to users.

    Description

    The mail module provides simple classes and methods for sending EMails to users.
